Generation V.Black: It has black, cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.
Generation V.White: It loyally follows its Trainer's orders. For ages, they have helped Trainers raise Pokémon.
Generation V.Black 2: This very loyal Pokémon helps Trainers, and it also takes care of other Pokémon.
Generation V.White 2: This very loyal Pokémon helps Trainers, and it also takes care of other Pokémon.

Generation VI.X: This very loyal Pokémon helps Trainers, and it also takes care of other Pokémon.
Generation VI.Y: It has black, cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: This very loyal Pokémon helps Trainers, and it also takes care of other Pokémon.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It has black, cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.

Generation VII.Sun: Its dense black fur grows continuously. The high cost of keeping its hard fur properly groomed makes this a troublesome Pokémon to train.
Generation VII.Moon: This Pokémon obeys its master's orders faithfully. However, it refuses to listen to anything said by a person it doesn't respect.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: The longer its black fur grows, the harder and more impervious it gets. Claws and fangs can't easily penetrate it.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It has been living with people for so long that portrayals of it can be found on the walls of caves from long, long ago.

Generation VIII.Sword: Herdier is a very smart and friendly Pokémon. So much so that there's a theory that Herdier was the first Pokémon to partner with people.
Generation VIII.Shield: The black fur that covers this Pokémon's body is dense and springy. Even sharp fangs bounce right off.

Generation V.Black: Route 10 , Cold Storage , P2 Laboratory Route 1 ( dark grass )
Generation V.White: Route 10 , Cold Storage , P2 Laboratory Route 1 ( dark grass )
Generation V.Black 2: Routes 1 , 2 , and 3 , P2 Laboratory Floccesy Ranch ( Hidden Grotto )
Generation V.White 2: Routes 1 , 2 , and 3 , P2 Laboratory Floccesy Ranch ( Hidden Grotto )

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Training Lowlands ( Wanderer ) Fields of Honor ( Max Raid Battle )
